channel.title: Runescape Private Servers coming to an end?
channel.description: I was talking to silabsoft on IRC and also read some posts on the forums and saw that silabsoft had decided to remove the webclient. A bunch of servers and other web clients have been shut down also. Jagex seems to be going for web clients and famous servers and clients. What do you think will happen?

item.title: Runescape Private Servers coming to an end?
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

primadude:

http://thesilabclient.com/

See. They will never be able to shut down everything.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Private Servers coming to an end?
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

RSPS will go on. Jagex wouldn’t bother wasting all their time trying to get rid of private servers…
They’ll shut down some 500+, But IMO, I do not think they’ll come after the big 317s…

[size=20]RSPS WILL GO ON[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Private Servers coming to an end?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Moparisthebest:

They aren’t coming to an end, Jagex uses scare tactics a lot, but as long as you are within the law they can’t do anything to you.

Even if they do these tatics the servers and clients will never disappear! They are not going to be able to remove the millions of RSPS related files from our computers. I still have a couple of gigabytes lying around on one of my computers.
If the community is forced to shut down there will be an equivalent created.

Read full topic

item.source: Runescape Private Servers coming to an end?

item.title: Runescape Private Servers coming to an end?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:10, topic:286737”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=379199.msg2851929#msg2851929 date=1246582084]
They aren’t coming to an end, Jagex uses scare tactics a lot, but as long as you are within the law they can’t do anything to you.
[/quote]
If they send you complaints over the client (mainly 317), how can you protect yourself? Does Jagex still even own the copyrights for the 317 caches?
Because if you ask me, I’m not sure how you can stay in the law if it’s copyrighted and it’s not being used on their official servers

Would having the client remotely hosted fix that? Because technically, you would just be serving links to the content. Although the client connects to a server hosted by you, it’d be the user’s decision to do that?[/quote]

Well, as you can see I have a TOS that, while possibly not being legally binding, is at least legally binding as jagex’s TOS. Also no possibly copyrighted content is hosted on this server, in case you didn’t notice.

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape Private Servers coming to an end?

item.title: Runescape Private Servers coming to an end?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:11, topic:286737”]Have you noticed this?:

FrugooScape - Runs FrugooScape 317 for something like 2 years; starts up a 500+ webclient, then shut down.
Dodian - Runs Dodian 317 for 4 years; starts up a 500+ server and webclient, then shut down.[/quote]
Heh, I’m guessing so then, because I also remember reading somewhere that Jagex had lost the copyrights to the old caches or just didn’t renew them, because they weren’t majorly used?

I was aware Dodian had and got shut down but I WASN’T aware they had a 500+ >.>. I don’t keep up to date :3

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape Private Servers coming to an end?

item.title: Runescape Private Servers coming to an end?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Have you noticed this?:

FrugooScape - Runs FrugooScape 317 for something like 2 years; starts up a 500+ webclient, then shut down.
Dodian - Runs Dodian 317 for 4 years; starts up a 500+ server and webclient, then shut down.

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape Private Servers coming to an end?

item.title: Runescape Private Servers coming to an end?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Moparisthebest:

They aren’t coming to an end, Jagex uses scare tactics a lot, but as long as you are within the law they can’t do anything to you.

If they send you complaints over the client (mainly 317), how can you protect yourself? Does Jagex still even own the copyrights for the 317 caches?
Because if you ask me, I’m not sure how you can stay in the law if it’s copyrighted and it’s not being used on their official servers

Would having the client remotely hosted fix that? Because technically, you would just be serving links to the content. Although the client connects to a server hosted by you, it’d be the user’s decision to do that?

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape Private Servers coming to an end?

It is impossible for Jagex to completly remove all servers

They cant ‘remove’ any server, but they can shut down websites.

item.title: Runescape Private Servers coming to an end?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

r0ckstar96:

but dude rsps are some peoples lives. Like me, I’ve spent over 1000 hours putting effort into servers. I found out about RuneScape private servers, quit 2 times, and I started with them again and I’m not gonna stop. I hope they never end. Long live SilabSoft, Long live MoparScape, Long live RSPS!

Then you need new priorities. A hobby is fine, but if it consumes your life then you have a problem.

No, servers won’t end.

Read full topic
